definition: Global Tone Communication Technology Co., Ltd (GTCOM), Chinese big data and AI company

sentences.english: Interference of target language cultural can't be avoided in literary translation.
sentences.chinese: 譯語文化在文學翻譯活動中的介入不可避免。

sentences.english: The image of the translator exists in the poetic target language.
sentences.chinese: 譯者的形象伴隨着詩化的譯語而存在。

sentences.english: Only in this way can the information load of SL and TL be equalized.
sentences.chinese: 只有這樣，才能做到原語和譯語在信息量上的等值。
